org.mellowtech.core.sort

Interface BufferHeap

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteBufferHeap, ByteHeap

    public interface BufferHeap
    Defines methods for heaps that operates on byte buffers need to support. Heaps that implement this interface should use some sort of byte buffer that stores the actual data.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Martin Svensson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int delete()
      Detete and return the offset of the smallest object in this heap
      int get()
      Return the offset of the smallest object in this heap.
      void insert(int c)
      Insert a new offset into the heap.
